sentences.en: All afternoon we heaved bales of hay up onto the truck.
sentences.cn: 整个下午我们把一捆捆干草扔上卡车.
中文例句: 一捆捆的干草。

sentences.en: Hay fever is an affliction which arrives at an early age.
sentences.cn: 枯草热是年纪较小时会患的一种病。

sentences.en: He could smell muck and clean fresh hay.
sentences.cn: 他能闻到粪臭和清新的干草味。

sentences.en: He drove by with a big load of hay.
sentences.cn: 他载着一大车干草驶过。

sentences.en: He ignited the wood with a band of hay.
sentences.cn: 他用一把干草引燃了这些木柴.

sentences.en: He raises 2,000 acres of wheat and hay.
sentences.cn: 他种植了2,000英亩的小麦和牧草。

sentences.en: Rainy weather brings blessed relief to hay fever victims.
sentences.cn: 雨天会给枯草热患者带来欣喜，减轻他们的痛苦。

sentences.en: She advised him to make hay.
She's a victim of the dreaded hay fever.
sentences.cn: 她患上了花粉热这种讨厌的病症。

sentences.en: The farmers hurried to make hay before the rain came.
sentences.cn: 农民们在雨季到来之前赶紧晾晒干草.

sentences.en: The hay was baled and piled.
These men have quarreled over the price of a load of hay.
sentences.cn: 这帮人为了一车干草的价钱争吵不休.

sentences.en: We have to fork the hay into the wagon.
sentences.cn: 我们得把干草用叉子挑进马车里去.
